1352742015637868544.name: Alex Krüger
1352742015637868544.content: Simple minded people fall for the Bitcoin vs Ethereum narrative. These two crypto assets serve different purposes. There's significant value in both. Dumping $ETH for $BTC is similar to selling tech stocks to hold only gold.
